definition: certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: You may draw on our discussions of witty ladies in earlier works if you like.
sentences.chinese: 你也可從我們以前討論的較早時作品中的巧婦中取證。

sentences.english: Pre-registration visitors could receive license cover and sling there.
sentences.chinese: 預登記持卡觀衆可在此領取證件套及吊繩。

sentences.english: Reconnoitring and collecting evidence is the first step to castigate such crime .
sentences.chinese: 勘查與取證是打擊計算機犯罪的第一步。

sentences.english: Judge Orie pointed out that getting evidence in this case was an uphill battle for prosecutors.
sentences.chinese: 奧列法官指出，這個案件的取證是檢方的一個難關。

sentences.english: Therefore, there is no need to spend much money and effort to make an investigation in China again.
sentences.chinese: 所以，不需要花瑞士政府的人力財力再去中國取證。
當然這一說法還需要更多的調查取證。

sentences.english: On the basis of single track, entrust the defenders to the right of obtaining evidence.
sentences.chinese: 在單軌制偵查構造的基礎上，適當賦予辯方取證權利。

sentences.english: The barrister has to burden certain professional r is kin collecting evidence when he pleads criminally .
sentences.chinese: 律師在刑事辯護時，進行調查取證有一定的職業風險。

sentences.english: Mod ern countries all prohibit it in principle.
sentences.chinese: 現代國家原則上都禁止非法取證。

sentences.english: Part five probes into the system of investigation and evidence collection.
sentences.chinese: 第五部分探討了公共設施公益訴訟的調查取證制度。

sentences.english: In some cases, the audit details are insufficient for answering key forensic ques­tions.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情形下，審計的細節不夠解答關鍵取證問題。

sentences.english: On the basis of single track, entrust the defenders to the right of obtaining …
sentences.chinese: 在單軌制偵查構造的基礎上，適當賦予辯方取證權利。

definition: to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
to make a formal request/formal request/to make a claim (law)
to bring to justice/to punish according to the law
to examine a wound or injury (typically for forensic purposes)
